section.title: What is a Classifier?
section.para:
Knowledge has integrated a classifier also known as a semantic reasoner for use in authoring terminologies. A semnatic resoner is software that is able to infer logical consequences
Describes the relationship between statements that remain true when one statement logically follows one or more statementsfrom a set of axioms
An axiom or postulate is a statement that is taken to be true, to serve as a premise or starting point for further reasoning and arguments.. The rules used by the reasoner in Knowledge are specified in description logic
A knowledge representation language.
You can run the classifier anytime and view the results of your classification which is explained in the following sections.
